title: RIPEMD-160 Hash
description: RIPEMD-160 hash calculation, widely used in Bitcoin address generation
aboutDesc: RIPEMD-160 is a 160-bit cryptographic hash function designed by Hans Dobbertin, Antoon Bosselaers, and Bart Preneel. It is widely used in cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin to generate shorter addresses from SHA-256 hashes. The output length is fixed at 20 bytes (160 bits).
